title: Mechanical Advantage Formula
text: Recall the formula for mechanical advantge: $$\frac{F_o}{F_i}$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{L_o}{L_i}$$, where $$F_o$$ and $$L_o$$ is the output force applied and the distance $$F_o$$ is applied to the pivot respectively and $$F_i$$ and $$L_i$$ is the input force applied and the distance $$F_i$$ is applied to the pivot respectively. We know all other values, so now we just need to solve for $$F_i$$.
